title: Gemma Collins becomes the face of Poundland as she signs £1.1million deal

TOWIE royalty Gemma Collins has signed a lucrative new deal to be the face of Poundland.

She's scored a £1.1million contract to front the budget brand's new homeware venture.

This will reportedly see the GC plugging Poundland's range of cleaning products and soft furnishings in one of the biggest ever endorsement deals the brand has signed.

Gemma, 38, is already believed to be worth around £2.7 million, and will be laughing all the way to the bank after this latest cheque cashes.

Gemma also owns two clothing stores, has brought out a Boohoo line, released a perfume, two books, and is bringing out a Christmas single this year.

(Image: GC Images)

According to The Sun, Poundland chose Gemma because "everything The GC touches turns to gold".

A source said: "They think it will pay dividends in the long run.

“Gemma will be fronting a range of cleaning products and soft furnishings, all of which have been endorsed by her.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Getty Images)

“Poundland want to lift their status on the high street and by getting Gemma involved, they think they can add a touch of sparkle to their products.

"And her involvement will encourage her younger fan base into the store.”

Gemma is not the only TOWIE star to partner with Poundland - Ferne McCann and Jess Wright launched beauty ranges, and Mario Falcone released a male grooming range.

MirrorOnline has reached out to a representative for Gemma for comment.

(Image: Gemma Collins/Instagram)

Since appearing on The Only Way Is Essex, Gemma has done stints on Dancing On Ice, Celebrity Big Brother , Celebs Go Dating, and I'm A Celebrity.

Gemma has also recently filmed scenes back in TOWIE, despite vowing never to go back.

The show's official Instagram posted a photo of her sitting in a car.

(Image: Instagram)

They added the caption: "LOOK WHO'S BACK!!!"

Gemma excitedly reposted the photo on her account, and wrote alongside it: "THEY SEE ME ROLLING...❤️ filming for TOWIE tonight !

"They called her palace spoke to her peope... she drank her English breakfast from a fine china cup thought a while...... and then said ..... HELL YEAH #towieroyalty [sic]".
description: Gemma Collins has signed a £1.1million deal to front Poundland's new homeware line
